backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and contact messages with access control and adminâ€‘restricted queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode cybersecurity palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file including SEO metadata, Open Graph/Twitter tags, fonts, and React root mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering site sections, header/footer, dark-theme provider, and toast system.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Form component with validation and backend submission, showing success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About page section showing mission text, values grid, and company stats.
Contact section with company info, hours, and an embedded contact form.
Hero section with background image, headline, CTAs, and trust indicators.
Services grid listing cybersecurity offerings with icons, descriptions, and features.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and smooth-scroll section navigation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, logo, and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting contact messages via an actor, with success and error toasts and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, plus global typography, scrollbar, and focus styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, typography, breakpoints, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, features, image requirements, and state for the MJ CySec marketing site.
